description.zh: Budibase 是一个开源低代码平台，旨在帮助工程师快速安全地构建表单、门户和审批应用。它支持开发者创建具有响应式设计和性能优化的单页应用。该平台集成了多种数据源和工具，非常适合构建定制化的业务应用。
description.en: Budibase is an open-source low-code platform designed to help engineers quickly build forms, portals, and approval applications securely. It enables developers to create single-page applications with responsive design and performance optimization. The platform supports integration with various data sources and tools, making it ideal for building custom business applications.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过加速应用开发，帮助工程师节省数百小时
- 提供自托管和云托管两种部署选项
- 提供开发者友好的可扩展开源架构

## 功能列表:

- 构建并部署响应式单页应用
- 支持连接多种数据源，包括 MongoDB、PostgreSQL、MySQL、Airtable 等
- 使用预置 UI 组件实现快速应用开发
- 通过 Webhook 和 API 自动化工作流并与外部工具集成
- 支持在 Docker、Kubernetes、Digital Ocean 和 Portainer 上自托管部署
- 提供公共 API，用于扩展和将 Budibase 作为后端集成
- 支持全局设置下的用户/组管理和快速上手
- 与多种流行工具集成，适配现有技术栈
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Saves engineers 100s of hours by accelerating app development
- Offers both self-hosted and cloud-hosted deployment options
- Provides a developer-friendly, extensible, and open-source architecture

## Features:

- Build and deploy responsive single-page applications
- Connect to multiple data sources including MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Airtable, and more
- Use pre-built UI components for rapid application development
- Automate workflows and integrate with external tools via webhooks and APIs
- Support for self-hosting on Docker, Kubernetes, Digital Ocean, and Portainer
- Public API for extending and integrating Budibase as a backend
- Easy onboarding and user/group management with global settings
- Integration with popular tools to fit into existing tech stacks
